H0.text: A Brecon Buff is a variety of which type of creature. Chicken

H1.text: A Brecon Buff is a variety of which type of creature. Duck

H2.text: A Brecon Buff is a variety of which type of creature. Turkey

H3.text: A Brecon Buff is a variety of which type of creature. Geese

A4.text: Turkeys are large, heavyset galliforms in the genus Meleagris, indigenous to the Americas.

A5.text: The type species is the wild turkey (Meleagris gallopavo).
